text.name: chat_command_info_me_admin
text.text: If user has logged in as admin before, they can use this to make them admin again upon return to server.

text.name: chat_command_info_remove_admin
text.text: Removes admin from yourself on current session.

text.name: chat_command_info_users
text.text: Displays all available users on server with ID.

text.name: chat_command_info_moo
text.text: This command prints a text cow because why not.

text.name: chat_command_info_make_admin
text.text: Admin can use this command to make another online user an admin. User ID provided from #getUsers command.

text.name: chat_command_info_rememberme
text.text: Sets user to auto admin when they log on the server.

text.name: chat_command_info_forgetme
text.text: Sets user to no longer auto admin when they log on the server.

text.name: chat_command_info_getfarms
text.text: Displays all available farms on server with ID.

text.name: chat_command_info_makefm
text.text: Add user to farm with user id and farm id. User ID provided from #getUsers command. Farm ID provided from #getFarms command.

text.name: chat_command_info_save_vehicles
text.text: Saves locations of all vehicles on the server to a file to be called later with #resetVehicles

text.name: dc_help_page_base_text
text.text: FSG Companion is a simple yet advanced dedicated server tool to help admins better manage their servers.

text.name: dc_help_page_base_cmds
text.text: The following command can be typed directly into the multiplayer chat to be executed.

text.name: rc_max_hire_warn
text.text: Max hired workers reached for this farm.

text.name: rc_max_placeables
text.text: This farm has max placeables for this store item.

text.name: rc_max_productions
text.text: This farm has max factories for this store item.

text.name: rc_max_sellingpoints
text.text: This farm has max selling points for this store item.

text.name: rc_max_farmhouses
text.text: This farm has max farmhouses for this store item.

text.name: rc_max_lights
text.text: This farm has max lights for this store item.

text.name: rc_max_generators
text.text: This farm has max generators for this store item.

text.name: rc_admin_only_place
text.text: Only Admins Can Place This Item.

text.name: rc_max_items
text.text: This farm has max items for this store item.

text.name: rc_max_missions
text.text: This farm has reached max missions allowed.

text.name: ui_fsgSettingsNoPermissionText
text.text: Only Admins can alter these settings.

text.name: button_storeVehicleConfirm
text.text: Do you really want to store this vehicle on the website for $1,000?

text.name: ui_settings_toolTip_paintAnywhere
text.text: Allows players to paint or terraform anywhere on the map.

text.name: ui_settings_toolTip_hireLimit
text.text: Max number of AI allowed to be hired per farm.

text.name: ui_settings_toolTip_maxMissions
text.text: Max number of Missions allowed to be active per farm.

text.name: ui_settings_toolTip_husbandryLimit
text.text: Max number of animal pins allowed per store animal type.

text.name: ui_settings_toolTip_productionPoints
text.text: Max number of productions per store item allowed per farm.

text.name: ui_settings_toolTip_sellingPoints
text.text: Max number of selling points per store item allowed per farm.

text.name: ui_settings_toolTip_farmHouses
text.text: Max number of farm houses per store item allowed per farm.

text.name: ui_settings_toolTip_generators
text.text: Max number of generators per store item allowed per farm.

text.name: ui_settings_toolTip_floodLighting
text.text: Max number of light poles per store item allowed per farm.

text.name: ui_settings_toolTip_otherPlaceables
text.text: Max number of placeables per store item allowed per farm.

text.name: ui_settings_toolTip_gardenSheds
text.text: Max number of gardenSheds per store item allowed per farm.

text.name: ui_settings_toolTip_dismissWorkers
text.text: Any workers left hired on an empty farm are auto dismissed.

text.name: ui_settings_toolTip_inboxActive
text.text: When enabled the FSG Companion will process commands that are in the inbox folder. When disabled commands are ignored.

text.name: ui_settings_toolTip_transactionId
text.text: Current Transaction Id for website communication tracking.

text.name: ui_settings_toolTip_coopLimitsEnabled
text.text: Enables CO-OP limits for the server.

text.name: ui_settings_toolTip_coopMinCruiseSpeed
text.text: System checks for vehicles that are driving with cruise set at or below min cruise speed.

text.name: ui_settings_toolTip_coopMinCruiseMin
text.text: How many minutes a vehicle can be set at the min cruise speed before cruise is stopped.

text.name: ui_settings_toolTip_disableSleep
text.text: When enabled players will not be able to sleep in game via the sleep triggers.

text.name: ui_settings_toolTip_disableBorrowEquipment
text.text: Disables the ability to borrow equipment for contracts.

text.name: ui_settings_info_1
text.text: Welcome to FSG Realism! We are excited that you are a part of this journey in pixel farming!

text.name: ui_settings_info_2
text.text: Our FSG Companion mod enables our servers to communicate with the website to complete transactions such as Money Transfers, Vehicle Transfers, and much more.

text.name: ui_settings_info_3
text.text: The settings in this panel are only editable by our admins, but we have made them visible for everyone to view.

text.name: ui_settings_info_4
text.text: FSG Companion is designed to work with https://www.FSGRealism.com

text.name: toolTip_realTimeSync_serverOffset
text.text: Offset the game time from UTC time in hours.

text.name: toolTip_realTimeSync_timeFixHour
text.text: Limit server time to auto fix to a set hour based on computer offset time. Always will keep time matched.

text.name: toolTip_realTimeSync_autoSetTime
text.text: Allow game set time when more than 5 min ahead instead of slowing time down. Skips to next day.

text.name: toolTip_realTimeSync_timeSyncEnable
text.text: Turn Real Time Sync On or Off.

text.name: title_realTimeSync_inProgress
text.text: Time Sync In Progress - Target time:

text.name: title_realTimeSync_setInProgress
text.text: Time Sync In Progress - Time set to:

text.name: toolTip_realTimeSync_progressNotification
text.text: Enable or disable the time sync notification that lets you know when time sync is in progress.
